span.p:
The Upper Adams School District Board of Directors will meet Tuesday, April 21, 2020, at 6:30 p.m. for a Study Session with the regular board meeting beginning at 7:00 p.m. Due to COVID-19s social distancing and stay at home mandates by Governor Wolf, the Board of Directors meeting will be held remotely utilizing a Zoom Meeting format.
The public may join the meeting in the Board Room of the District Offices utilizing social distancing while in the meeting area or the public may join the Zoom meeting using the following information:
Topic: Upper Adams School District's Personal Meeting Room

br.br: If you have any questions about how the remote meetings via Zoom are being run or if you would like to be placed on a future agenda to speak to the Board during public comment, please contact the following email address, Questions4Board@upperadams.org

a.title: Go to comments for Board Meeting Format

Related To Coronavirus, School Closures, Technology Access,

strong.a: Please Click Here To Read The 04/09/2020 Press Release From Pennsylvania Governor Tom Wolf Announcing The Closure Of All School Districts For The Remainder Of The Academic School Year!

div.span: The Upper Adams School District provides challenging and inspiring educational

br.span: opportunities, empowering each student to be a responsible and productive individual.
